column5: I am faking my way through life I have nothing and no one to love I cant seem to find happiness and I've been wanting to die for so long idk when it started I can only feel sad and hopelessness nothing I do matters the only reason I haven't killed myself is the vary few friends I have that I care about would hurt I'd rather suffer then make anyone hurt but it's getting harder to care

It's not so much that you get more sad you just have more stuff to deal with that weighs on your mind more and you get more and more stressed about things you can't control despite knowing that you have no control over them

I want the same thing I just ask this girl out at work she said yes I almost threw up in my mouth when she did cuz I was expecting a no and then come to find out from some of the other people she said yes to be nice but doesn't actually want to go out with me
I really thought I was the only one people I have told this fact you look at me like I have 10 heads and three of them are on fire
Pretty much Xbox kept me sane well as sane can be
Into the pockets of our corrupt politicians Governors and mayors
I understand how you feel I keep asking ppl I've got you know if they want to be more then friends and I've never gotten a yes I've never been in a real relationship I am 27
Thank you it's not and easy road for anyone we just have to try and make the best out of it

I will be turning 28 this year and I cant get my family to understand that I've wanted to die scents I was 14 despite me trying to  kill myself  4 times if you would have told me that I'd make it to 20 let alone 28 I would have told you to duck off I dont remember what it's like to be actually happy
https://www.gofundme.com/f/ellie-the-weenie-surgery-fund/share if anyone help my best friends dog we would be so grateful
https://www.gofundme.com/f/ellie-the-weenie-surgery-fund/share I am posing  this to help one of my best friends dogs needs help to save her dog if anyone can help her we would be so grateful
Does anybody else walk around how do I look like a big truck passes by ears think I bet my head could founder there but you only have a thought for like a Split Second and it weird you out
All I want to do is die every day I wake up and am genuinely annoyed that I didn't die in my sleep

I've been struggling with my depression for years now but I can't seem to get people to understand how serious it is I just can't keep getting told you can make it you can do it and that's it people don't seem to understand just how serious and severe depression is for people

I love my Xbox friends. One of The guys I met on here. I actually flew to Florida and met him and hung out. And he died recently. I just want to go out with people. I know sometimes. But I can't seem to keep people in my life.
I will take this under advisement. I just can't figure it out. But I'm well to my myself more

I understand how you feel somewhat all of my friends stop talking to me once I moved I don't have any friends where I moved I don't understand how people say they love to hang out and talk and then ghost me the next it's happened all my life I work and come home. That is it. I play Xbox. And that's pretty much my only Escape.
